definition: to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: The gel would probably be injected after the scar tissue has been surgically removed.
sentences.chinese: 這種凝膠可能會在手術摘除疤痕組織後注射。

sentences.english: After removing eyeballs, peripheral blood was obtained by micro-injector.
sentences.chinese: 眼球摘除後微量進樣器於眼窩處取外周血。

sentences.english: To evaluate the effect of excision of the fistulous tract in the treatment of congenital lacrimal sac fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估淚囊瘻摘除術治療先天性淚囊瘻的效果。

sentences.english: Bags must be removed in the packinghouse away from the packing line.
sentences.chinese: 袋子必須包裝廠中遠離包裝包裝線的地方摘除。

sentences.english: He returned to Eagle and removed his helmet in the repressurized cabin .
sentences.chinese: 他回到鷹號在增壓艙摘除宇航帽。

sentences.english: Thirdly, having eye excises in break time helps relaxing our eyes.
sentences.chinese: 再次，有眼摘除在休息時間幫助放鬆我們的眼睛。

sentences.english: Children are sometimes born with cataracts that need to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 一些兒童天生就患有白內障，這是一定要摘除的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the operation effect of laparoscopic ovariotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腹腔鏡卵巢摘除術的手術效果。

sentences.english: If that's the real right,then again, there'd be nothing wrong with removing the heart in D.
sentences.chinese: 如果這纔是對的，在D階段摘除心臟是可以的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a best operation method of enucleation and plasty of eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求眼球摘除和整形的最佳手術方法。

sentences.english: Accordingly, she was removed of her crown.
The patient was treated with surgery and adjuvant radiotherapy followed by systemic chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 於腫瘤摘除術後輔以放射治療及化學治療。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the causes of enucleation of globe in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析兒童眼球摘除的原因。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the indications and orbital reconstruction of exenteration .
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解眶內容摘除術的適應證及眶腔修復方法。

sentences.english: Clinical symptoms and renal of all patients have significant improvement after prostatectomy.
sentences.chinese: 行前列腺摘除術可有效改善臨牀症狀及腎功能。

definition: incision/notch/slit/gash/margin of a page/trimmed edge (of a page in a book)
slang/argot/private language used as secret code
terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
